titles.title: Fairness in Securities Transactions Act
To amend the Securities Exchange Act of 1934 to reduce fees on securities transactions.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Finance and Hazardous Materials.

bill.summary: 7/17/1998--Introduced. Fairness in Securities Transactions Act - Amends the Securities Exchange Act of 1934 to reduce by half ( from one three-hundredth of one percent to one six-hundredth of one percent) the transaction fees designed to recover the costs to the Government of securities markets oversight and enforcement.
